charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Gloria, and Hop were
battling together as a team one day and managed
to win several times in a row.
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_0200_1:
All right! We’re making great progress! Let’s
maintain the momentum and keep up our winning
streak as long as we can!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_0300_1:
Yeah! With all our strength combined, we’re
unbeatable!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_0500_1:
Yeah! Maybe it’s ’cause we’re with you, Hop, but
Cinderace seems even more motivated
than usual!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0401_0700_1:
Hee hee! Well...because Hop and Cinderace have
a really deep connection!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0402_0900_1: Yeah! They’ve got a really deep connection!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1000_1:
Hop was the one who gave me the Egg I raised
Cinderace from!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1100_1:
So I think Cinderace might be trying to show off
how strong he’s become!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1200_1:
I don’t think it has much to do with me
being here...
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1300_1: I think he takes after you, Gloria. He hates losing!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1400_1:
Your Cinderace loves eating, too, right? Especially
Max Soup?
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1500_1:
That’s right! Cinderace and I are both huge fans of
Max Soup!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1800_1:
I think he’s been more influenced by you than
by me, Hop.
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_1900_1:
When I’m battling with Cinderace, I’m often
reminded of Hop and Scorbunny’s intense
fighting spirit...
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_2000_1:
And I will say that Cinderace’s tendency to get a
bit TOO enthusiastic can be somewhat of a
weak point...
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_2100_1: And, well, who does THAT remind you of?
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0301_2300_1:
I think he got his strengths from both
of you.
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0401_2500_1:
Well, if he’s combined both our strengths, it’s no
wonder he’s so strong!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0302_2600_1:
He’s learning from everyone’s
best traits.
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0402_2700_1:
Yeah, you’re right! He wasn’t influenced by just
one person but by LOADS of people!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_0402_2800_1:
When you put it like that, he sounds
awfully dependable!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_2900_1:
There are so many other people and Pokémon on
Pasio to learn from besides us...
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_3000_1:
I’d like him to keep learning great tips from all of
them, to keep growing better and better!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_3100_1:
Heh heh! I’m looking forward to seeing how
Cinderace matures from now on!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1101_3300_2:
Your next opponents are ready, so the battle can
now begin!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_3500_1: All riiight! Let’s get our heads back in the game!
charaepi_ch0243_81_yuri/2301_1201_3600_1: Come on, everyone! Let’s win this next one, too!
